alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 06 at 7:11PM PST until December 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. Strongest winds will be through the Interstate 5 corridor, the hills above Montecito, and in the higher mountain locations of northern Ventura County. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range, Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty north winds are expected in other locations as well, including some coast and valley areas of Los Angeles, Ventura, and Santa Barbara Counties, and wind advisories may be added in those areas as the event gets closer.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
